# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

message(STATUS "Setting up module " example)

FILE(GLOB gensources
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/example/*.cpp")

FILE(GLOB genheaders
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/example/*.h")

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${EXAMPLEDEPENDENCY_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${HDF5_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${RMF_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${EXAMPLEDEPENDENCY_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${HDF5_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${RMF_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMPEXAMPLE_EXPORTS")

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${EXAMPLE_CXX_FLAGS}")

set(headers ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleComplexRestraint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleConstraint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleDecorator.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExamplePairScore.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleRefCounted.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleRestraint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleSingletonModifier.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleSubsetFilterTable.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleTemplateClass.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/ExampleUnaryFunction.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/complex_assembly.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/counting.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/creating_restraints.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/optimizing.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/include/randomizing.h)

if(DEFINED IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES)
  set_source_files_properties(${IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
                              PROPERTIES GENERATED 1)
endif()

if(DEFINED IMP_example_IS_PER_CPP)
  set(sources ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleComplexRestraint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleConstraint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleDecorator.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExamplePairScore.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleRefCounted.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleRestraint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleSingletonModifier.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/ExampleSubsetFilterTable.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/complex_assembly.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/optimize_balls.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/example/src/use_example_dependency.cpp)

  add_library(imp_example ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${sources}
              ${IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )
else()

  add_library(imp_example ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/example_all.cpp
              ${IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )

endif()
INSTALL(TARGETS imp_example DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR})

if(DEFINED IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES)
  add_dependencies(imp_example ${IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES})
endif()

target_link_libraries(imp_example
                      ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_STATISTICS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
${IMP_RMF_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DOMINO_LIBRARY}
                      ${EXAMPLEDEPENDENCY_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES}
${RMF_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES}
${HDF5_LIBRARIES}
  )

set(IMP_EXAMPLE_LIBRARY imp_example CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
